sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from "react"; export default class PaymentHistory extends Component { // Konstruktor //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { payments: [], detail: false, } } // Získání dat //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// componentDidMount() { // Request fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/payments/" + this.props.userID) .then(response => response.json().then(data => this.setState({ payments: data, }))); } // Vykreslení ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// render() { let year = new Date().getFullYear(); let showDetail = (this.state.detail ? "show" : "hide"); console.log(showDetail); return(
{this.state.payments.map((item, index) =>
{item.paymentDate.replace(year, "")}
{item.name}
{item.amount} {item.currency}
{item.paymentType}
Variabilní symbol: {item.variableSymbol}
Konstantní symbol: {item.constantSymbol}
Specifický symbol:
ID transakce: {item.id}
Datum platby: {item.paymentDate}
)}
) } }
